title: Footstep4 SoundEffect
description: This is the Footstep4 Mega Pack, offering an extensive collection of footsteps for authentic, high-quality sound simulation in natural environments. Experience realistic footstep sounds like never before!
longDescription:
Preview.

  • https://youtu.be/VCyPftoBJD4

This is the Footstep4 Mega Pack, offering an extensive collection of footsteps for authentic, high-quality sound simulation in natural environments. Experience realistic footstep sounds like never before!

  • 676 Sound, 676 Cue
  • Grass, Gravel, Leaves, Rock, Sand, Water, ShallowWater, Snow, Stone, Undergrowth, Wood Footsteps


File.

  • Grass 68
  • Gravel 74
  • Ground 52
  • Leaves 75
  • Rock 24
  • Sand 75
  • ShallowWater 50
  • Snow 80
  • Stone 48
  • Undergrowth 69
  • Water 25
  • Wood 36

technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.

  • Number of Audio Wavs: 676
  • Number of Audio Cue: 676
  • Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)
  • Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)
  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
  • Do Sound FX loop: No
  • Minutes of audio provided: 4:30
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes


LOUDNESS.

  • Average Short Term : -10 LUFS ~
  • Average Long Trem : -12 LUFS ~
  • Average Range : 12 LU ~
  • Average Momentary : - 8 LUFS ~
  • Average Trim : 3.0~
  • TruePeak : -0 dBTP
  • The loudness values (Short Term, Long Term, Range, Momentary, TruePeak, etc.) may vary depending on the theme, timbre, and character of sound effects.


SOUND EFFECT CREATION METHODS.

How to Create: This product has been produced in a professional studio.

Mixing & Mastering : Yes, This product has been mastered in a professional studio.
